item.description:
Get together to talk about Boston sailing opportunities and networking for the Boston Sailing Meetup group.

Here's your chance to network with people and talk about sailing in Boston. Use this time to find out about the different sailing options, and clubs around Boston Harbor.

Come have a drink with a great group of fellow Boston Sailing Enthusiasts! Meet at Boston Sail Loft Bar in the North End (80 Atlantic Ave) at 7:30pm. Talk about your sailing options for the summer.

ps. We suggest this be a regular 3rd Wednesday of the Month Meetup. We'll try to get someone to "present" their option for each meetup.
item.name: Boston Sailing Meetup
